 Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 11:17 PM

            (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow =
in it's holster. He clutches his fists and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fi=
st fight. Stiller motions for Arrow to come...)

al Message -----

                From: *Orchid*=

y, July 07, 2001 5:17 AM

k... again/Clash


                MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / V=
IRGO / LEE / DEPP





                (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy bal=
ls and fires a missile at Nightlight.)



                (Barrymore takes =
one of the energy balls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump.=
 She fires 6 laser beams at Nightlight.)



                (Depp is struck=
 by both energy balls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots=
 at Nightlight.)



                (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls =
a pin from a grenade and throws it in front of the Chivtron base.)



     =
           (Stiller growls and fires an arrow at Arrow.)



               =
 (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's legs, attempting to trip her up.=
)



                (Virgo fires a red energy draining dart at Nightlight.=
..)

                  against Airbomber, 2 agaisnt S=
tranato and 2 against Stronghold. But 
                  she was hit by the=

                  her fe=
ll. 

                  She felt stunned and she would be defendless a shor=
t while.
